textBox.richText: Between 1904 and 1907, more than half the population of both the Herero and Nama peoples of Namibia were killed by German genocidal imperial tactics, including starvation, forced relocation, and the poisoning of well-water. I have put the few links I have found here: Links Regarding the Genocide of the Herero & Nama. More scholarship is needed. I have also added content to the teaching pages below: Links for General Reference Links for Student-Friendly Sites More is coming, just as quick as I can. I am adding a bit to each page and then, when each page has starter content, I plan to cycle back through and flesh them out with more sources. Someday, I may finally even add my own original work!
